Class InitStateTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • org.ginsim.gui.graph.regulatorygraph.initialstate.InitStateTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, TableModel
    public class InitStateTableModel
extends AbstractTableModel
    model for the initState table. "help" the user to select initial states for his simulation.
